results.definition: any inanimate object (as a towel or money or clothing or dishes or books or toys etc.) that can transmit infectious agents from one person to another
a conveyance that transports people or objects
a medium for the expression or achievement of something
examples: his editorials provided a vehicle for his political views
a congregation is a vehicle of group identity
the play was just a vehicle to display her talents

results.definition: any substance that facilitates the use of a drug or pigment or other material that is mixed with it
